tracetool
Class TraceToSend

java.lang.Object
  tracetool.TraceNodeBase
      tracetool.TraceToSend
Direct Known Subclasses:
TraceNode, WinTrace
public abstract class TraceToSend
extends TraceNodeBase

Base class for TraceNode and WinTrace.

Methods of TraceSend can send new traces to the viewer, but cannot be re-send

The TTrace.debug() object ,for example, is a TraceSend instance

Author:
tpa

sendValue

public TraceNode sendValue(java.lang.String leftMsg,
                           java.lang.Object objToSend)
Send Private and public values of an object.

sendValue is quite different from sendObject : less verbal (no class info) but can show many level.

Parameters:
leftMsg - The message text
objToSend - the object to examine
Returns:
A trace node
Since:
4.0.0

sendValue

public TraceNode sendValue(java.lang.String leftMsg,
                           java.lang.Object objToSend,
                           boolean sendPrivate)
Send Private and public values of an object.

sendValue is quite different from sendObject : less verbal (no class info) but can show many level.

Parameters:
leftMsg - The message text
objToSend - the object to examine
sendPrivate - flag to send private field
Returns:
A trace node
Since:
4.0.0

sendValue

public TraceNode sendValue(java.lang.String leftMsg,
                           java.lang.Object objToSend,
                           boolean sendPrivate,
                           int maxLevel)
Send Private and public values of an object.

> sendValue is quite different from sendObject : less verbal (no class info) but can show many level.

Parameters:
leftMsg - The message text
objToSend - the object to examine
sendPrivate - flag to send private field
maxLevel - The number of sub element to display. Default is 3
Returns:
A trace node
Since:
4.0.0

sendValue

public TraceNode sendValue(java.lang.String leftMsg,
                           java.lang.Object objToSend,
                           boolean sendPrivate,
                           int maxLevel,
                           java.lang.String title)
Send Private and public values of an object.

sendValue is quite different from sendObject : less verbal (no class info) but can show many level.

Parameters:
leftMsg - The message text
objToSend - the object to examine
sendPrivate - flag to send private field
maxLevel - The number of sub element to display. Default is 3
title - object title
Returns:
A trace node
Since:
4.0.0

sendObject

public TraceNode sendObject(java.lang.String leftMsg,
                            java.lang.Object objToSend)
Send a trace and an object (class info, fields, method)

Take care that inspecting object is very slow (reflection is slow)

Parameters:
leftMsg - The trace message to send
objToSend - The object to inspect
Returns:
A trace node
See Also:
sendObject(String , Object , int )

sendObject

public TraceNode sendObject(java.lang.String leftMsg,
                            java.lang.Object objToSend,
                            int flags)
Send a trace and an object (class info, fields, method)

Take care that inspecting object is very slow (reflection is slow)

Parameters:
leftMsg - The left trace message to send
objToSend - The object to inspect
flags - Let you specify what to send
Returns:
A trace node
See Also:
sendObject(String , Object , int )
